originalText.text: I have been a patient of Dr. Tobias’ for 20+ years. He is without a doubt the best! If you were doing a check-off survey of what makes a great doctor and person, every box would be checked off.  A real life saver for me.

text.text: I have been a patient of Dr. Tobias’ for 20+ years. He is without a doubt the best! If you were doing a check-off survey of what makes a great doctor and person, every box would be checked off.  A real life saver for me.

originalText.text: I usually don’t like going to see doctors in general but i make an exception for Dr.  Tobias! He is a very nice and knowledgeable doctor with a great staff and administrative team, Anna and Jessica are fantastic!

text.text: I usually don’t like going to see doctors in general but i make an exception for Dr.  Tobias! He is a very nice and knowledgeable doctor with a great staff and administrative team, Anna and Jessica are fantastic!

originalText.text: Dr. Tobias is literally my life saver. Misdiagnosed for three years, Dr. Tobias was suggested to me. He took the time to dig deeper than the obvious, and found my true diagnosis. It has been 22 years and I am alive today because of him! Thank you Dr. Tobias - you are the best!

text.text: Dr. Tobias is literally my life saver. Misdiagnosed for three years, Dr. Tobias was suggested to me. He took the time to dig deeper than the obvious, and found my true diagnosis. It has been 22 years and I am alive today because of him! Thank you Dr. Tobias - you are the best!

originalText.text: Dr. Tobias and Anna Lipman, NP both are so dedicated to the care and concerns of their patient. As a patient with a complicated health package to work with they together met the challenge head on. They have continued to give me the best life I can get with having a gastrointestinal autoimmune issue plus ther related health issues.
